website_summaries.verdict: A nice addition to your oral care routine that does more than just freshen your breath.
pros: Keeps your mouth feeling fresh for hours
cons: A few have said it left stains in their sinks

customer_reviews.title: Very good germ killing mouthwash that won't make you gag.  :-)
customer_reviews.text: Before I started using Crest Pro-Health, I had constant dry mouth due to a combination of the old germ killer I used and the medications I have to take. After using Crest for a few months now, my dry mouth is gone, my gums look better and I could swear that my teeth are brighter. The best thing is the taste; it really is quite pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Old Army Dog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance of minty and clean
customer_reviews.text: Though the headline may sounds odd, I'll explain. Other mouthwashes that leave your mouth feeling clean have that burn with them. I'm sorry but I don't like having to fight through rinsing my mouth. Then you have mouthwashes that don't burn but fall flat in the feeling clean department. This mouthwash is the perfect balance between leaving your mouth feeling clean and not burning.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: If you like to taste your food, don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product twice now and oddly enough, both times it has affected my sense of taste, and I can’t taste salt at all. I could lick a salt block and taste nothing. After a few hours it starts getting better but takes a day or two to go back to normal. I also have a weird taste in my mouth since my tastebuds are off. This stuff is going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Meem

customer_reviews.title: Going back to the original version
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan. I like the old version better. This bubbles if you try gargling with it and leaves a nasty aftertaste long after you are spit it out.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: #1Mouthwash, Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mouthwash I would Recommend. Immediately upon switching you’ll feel the difference, after using the Crest Pro-Health toothpaste(which is great and leaves your teeth super clean), you use this wash and your teeth feel like they’re naked they’re so clean. No burning since it’s alcohol free, just #SqueakyClean!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Decent mouthwash, wouldn't choose it over Listerine though
customer_reviews.text: The flavor isn't overpowering and there's no burn of alcohol, so it makes for a nice mouthwash if you cannot use an alcohol based mouthwash. I wish it included more beneficial ingredients, such as fluoride, as it is more expensive than, say, Listerine, but as it is it isn't terrible. I have to say that I didn't notice any difference in morning breath between this and Listerine, as I was afraid the alcohol was having a drying effect, but it doesn't seem to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a preferred brand. It doesnt have any crazy smells . I have used Listerine and some of those flavors make a person smell like he might have been drinking all night! This product is not like that. Pleasant taste and aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph  Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Can't taste anything after using the mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to taste anything since I started using the product. I did some research and this isn't an uncommon problem. They say the problem "usually" goes away in a few weeks when you stop using the mouthwash. I won't be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, it’s Crest so mediocrity is implied...
customer_reviews.text: I dunno, I guess I’m a sucker for the brutal pain of Listerine mouth wash, killing bacteria and nerve endings in my mouth in one fell swoop... whereas Crest has left my mouth feeling like I rinsed and swished with cotton candy water... consider an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Expert online shopper!

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as listerine
customer_reviews.text: Note that this is not a good substitute for listerine mouthwash. I should have read packaging more closely as it doesn’t contain fluoride and lacks many of the benefits of listerine
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Grant

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Mouth Clean
customer_reviews.text: It has a bit of a weird aftertaste that I have not yet experienced with other mouth washes. Probably because it's Flouride-free. But I still give it 5 starts because it works very well, plus it's only a 30-second swish as opposed to most others that recommend a 60-second swish.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hay

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay--nothing great, but it is decent.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer another brand, but this one is okay. As to the hype about what it does, I honestly have no idea since I don't notice a difference. Flavor is not overpowering and not sweet (which defeats the purpose of mouthwash--adding sugar to it). My wish is that they would eliminate the coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Stains my porcelain sink
customer_reviews.text: I really like Colgate, but, the coloring used in this mouthwash stains my porcelain sink if not wiped out right away :(
customer_reviews.author: IvanaYvonne

customer_reviews.title: Clean and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This mouth rinse cleanses my mouth after tooth brushing each evening just before I retire. It makes my mouth feel clean, and it's not too strong a taste. It has no alcohol, which tends to upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Contains methylparaben
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash contains methylparaben, a chemical which has been linked to cancer and reproductive problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Over the many years, I've tried other mouthwashes but Crest is simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter Brown & DD

customer_reviews.title: Never buying again.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible taste. Horrible mouth feel. Can't eat anything for hours after using because it wont taste right.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful mouth wash and it is alcohol free
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful mouth wash and it is alcohol free. The price is also considerably lower the anywhere localy.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Had tried the newer versions of this, and they were bitter to the point of having a bad aftertaste for others. For those who've used this version for years, IMHO don't switch to the newer versions.
customer_reviews.author: Tali18

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouthwash! It always makes my mouth feel super clean!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Has no alcohol in it.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to clean & wash out my mouth several times a day .
customer_reviews.author: where are my orders?

customer_reviews.title: best one yet
customer_reviews.text: ive tried a few mouthwash now and this is the best one so far
customer_reviews.author: Brayan

customer_reviews.title: Good fresh breath.
customer_reviews.text: Works good as I can tell... gives me fresh breath. Apparently my boyfriend loves it because it's about 1/2 gone already. Guess I'll keep buying it. It doesn't have the burn Listerine does but I kind of liked that about them-felt like something was happening. We will buy this again I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: and I love the freshness it leaves in my mouth
customer_reviews.text: Have used this mouth wash for a few years!and I love the freshness it leaves in my mouth. Wires well,especially in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: fred fagundez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - no question! Sells at a good price but only through Prime Pantry. Would give 5 stars if could get this deal without having to use Prime Pantry every time.
customer_reviews.author: HappyDad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t try to gargle
customer_reviews.text: Just ok, but don’t try to gargle with this stuff or it will bubble up all funky. Plus it seems to congeal into little bits which doesn’t look all that appealing....
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Its good and can use on the run with children and in morning when your well close to some one
customer_reviews.text: Yummy good breath and stron teeth what else can you say thank you
customer_reviews.author: Maryphillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. Most effective mouthwash, gum protection, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Ball

customer_reviews.title: My mouth feels protected
customer_reviews.text: Used it. All of it. So did my girlfriend, so it was nice to kiss her. I'm sure she felt the same. Use this and get good kisses.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Manuel

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT the 24hr mouthwash version as shown in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the 24hr mouthwash version as shown in the photo. This is the much weaker (new) version. I can't seem to find the old one anymore :(
customer_reviews.author: Keith & Lineta

customer_reviews.title: clean mint
customer_reviews.text: crest clean mint is a very good product to use, the cap Is easy to use to measure out how much u want to use and the mouthwash doesn't sting ur tongue or anything. my mouth feels very fresh and ready to go each time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: malcinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hubby's preferred mouthwash... filled grocery box with things we regularly use
customer_reviews.author: Cy Korte

customer_reviews.title: Pro-Health
customer_reviews.text: I like this. After receiving it I noticed the alcohol free label but I was not expecting it to be mildly sweet. I prefer the sting of the ones with alcohol in it I guess. Still using it though.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis B.

customer_reviews.title: Good mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mouth was. The taste is fine and it leaves me with a minty fresh feeling in my mouth. I personally like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Gili abro

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t burn
customer_reviews.text: It works well for a final rinse after brushing, we’ve used it for years
customer_reviews.author: Jan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's fine, but the photo is wrong. This is the dark blue, not the light blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... do and doesn't have a harsh sting to it like other brands
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do and doesn't have a harsh sting to it like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine G. Valero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great - my bf & I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price against market.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price here. Love the no alcohol composition and the clean feeling it gives throughout the day barring any over powering drink or food. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and gentle for my gums and doesn't burn... my whole family loves it too and tastes fresh and cleans wonderfully:)))
customer_reviews.author: LADY

customer_reviews.title: Bought this after trying it at the dentist's office
customer_reviews.text: This is my household's favorite mouthwash! When you spit it out, you can see little strings and clumps; we like to think of this as spitting out the plaque.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Clean with a sting!
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash burns a little but it leaves you feeling fresh and clean. Minty fresh feel after using.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mouthwash. It’s one of my favorites. One reason is that it’s alcohol free, which means it doesn’t burn like Listerine does in your mouth. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shannona

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst tasting mouth wash I have ever had...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mack

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!! Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST!! Arrived quickly, packaging & pricing was awesome, & same taste. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Blujdj

customer_reviews.title: Love my pro health Crest
customer_reviews.text: Love my pro health Crest! Leaving my mouth clean and teeth smoothed. Taste is not gagging. No burning on my gums either
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this mouth wash have your breath fresh will order again
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Pettaway

customer_reviews.title: Works! Fresh mouth..helps avoid cavities
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. A good size.
customer_reviews.author: Wantstoknow

customer_reviews.title: Really leave my mouth feeling dry afterwards. After three ...
customer_reviews.text: Really leaves my mouth feeling dry afterwards. After three or four days in a row my gums are very tender and it brushing is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Bill_Felix

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize that it was non alcohol until after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: This mouthwash was much less painful to use than any other kind I have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash was much less painful to use than any other kind I have tried except Scope. I will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes horrible and it does not make my mouth feel clean either. The cheap stuff works better.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff, it seems to work and doesn't dry out my mouth like alcohol based rinses. Hygienist complimented me on how I've been caring for my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: sadsack

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong flavor
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, even my 6 year old daughter likes it
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. I use it to soak my toothbrush and retainer to keep them bacteria free.
customer_reviews.author: Barbmom

customer_reviews.title: but not too strong that it burns which is just perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh taste, but not too strong that it burns which is just perfect!!!

customer_reviews.title: Buy in bulk if you can!
customer_reviews.text: The only choice for minty fresh breath without alcoholic burning my mouth....

customer_reviews.title: Crest Pro-Health Multi Protection Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: My mouth feels so much cleaner using Crest Mouthwash. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and doesn't burn like the kinds with alcohol.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very refreshing for your mouth after you brush your teeth !

customer_reviews.title: Good enough reason to switch from Cool Mint
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. No alcohol burn. Complex flavor with a candy-like finish. You'll swear off Cool Mint for this mouthwash.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton E. Harley

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: My roommate suggested we use this brand, and I do not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like to wash my mouth with this, and only this.
customer_reviews.author: Gulce

customer_reviews.title: Crest pro-HealthMulti-protection Refreshing mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The price you pay on amazon and delivered to your door is just wonderful.

customer_reviews.title: Crest mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mouthwash along time, and like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Caused loss of sense of taste.
customer_reviews.text: Used once and lost most of my sense of taste. 24 hours of not using it and still hasn't cleared up.

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: I kove this mouthwash, it makes my mouth feel clean and fresh, and it does not have the strong alcohol taste.

customer_reviews.text: Does the job but it has a bit of a plastic like aftertaste.

customer_reviews.title: It's mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: It works how you want it. i like how you can see the little blue stuff when you spit it out.

customer_reviews.title: Mouthwash Crest
customer_reviews.text: Does The Job But The Taste Is Not Promoting. Too Blend Not Strong Enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...
customer_reviews.text: It's alcohol free, which I like. The mint taste does not last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: G. Queen

customer_reviews.title: The product it's great don't get me wrong and it is what we ...
customer_reviews.text: The product it's great don't get me wrong and it is what we use at home but the price was a bit too high.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I mistakingly bought this product without knowing it was alcohol free. It's been 24 hours since I last used it (and promptly threw it in the trash) and my sense of taste has still not returned to normal. Stay far away. This is an awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Weird taste.  Stick to regular mouth wash.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an alternative to Listerine, which I've used for a while. The thing with this is that there is no alcohol burn - but I've found that I actually like the alcohol burn that comes with Listerine/regular mouth washes. This has more of a weird chemical/medicinal taste that I find unpleasing. It does burn far less than Listerine, but as I've said I don't mind the alcohol burn associated with normal mouthwashes. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Breath!
customer_reviews.text: Been using crest for a long time. Love the freshness, easy on the taste, does not burn, and alcohol free (in case you have an addict in the house - :)).
customer_reviews.author: Izzy G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mouthwash ever and you can't beat the price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Irby

customer_reviews.title: I noticed also that this mouthwash left my mouth tasting funny and kind of interfered with the taste of food
customer_reviews.text: I starting using this CPC mouth rinse after being diagnosed with gingivitis. I read some of the primary literature showing that this can marginally (but still significantly) improve gingivitis. However, this product can leave a brown residue on the teeth. Apparently this can be cleaned off by the dentist, but still could be a cosmetic issue. I noticed also that this mouthwash left my mouth tasting funny and kind of interfered with the taste of food.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: Deserves negative stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mouth wash for 10 days and now my teeth have brown stains all over them and my wife says I look like a meth head. Ignore all the fake reviews and RUN from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Bugleboy

customer_reviews.title: I thought my taste buds were permanently damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Literally destroyed my sense of taste for 3 days. Upon researching this seems to be a common issue with this product. It's also worth noting that this does not come with an ADA seal of acceptance which says a lot for something as simple as a mouthwash. Seriously avoid Crest Pro-Health Mouthwash.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: May stain your teeth!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to echo the other reviewers that said this stuff stained my teeth. Thankfully I usually research the active ingredients in things and read that this might happen with cetylpyridinium chloride (there's also a warning on the bottle in the fine print), so I was watching out for it and stopped using it as soon as I noticed. It's not too noticeable now, but I bet it would be worse if I hadn't been paying attention. Now I have an almost full bottle of mouthwash that I'll never use. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product as it actually does what it says ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as it actually does what it says and has no floride which I believe matters. I highly recommend it. Also, I used to always forget to repurchase after running out. Now I just go to my Amazon account and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: yaaa
customer_reviews.text: Nothing keeps those mouth clean during the morning time other than cresto pro-health. It's not that strong, so I can actually handle goggling. Usually, other products are a bit too strong for me. GOod stuff
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Noticed it had parabens in it which I try to
customer_reviews.text: Noticed it had parabens in it which I try to avoid

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product but I have too many bottles of mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product but I have too many bottles of mouthwash. Don't need so many and would like to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Miles, author of Dazzled by Darkness

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but my kids complain about their cheeks burning after

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hurts my mouth, it says no alcohol but it still burned.

customer_reviews.title: Stains teeth
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me this stains your teeth the day it arrived. I decided to dump it out and go with Listeribe. I think this product does a good job keeping your mouth fresh though.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice size bottle for the price.It was still cheaper than the store.And it wasn't outdated.
customer_reviews.author: S.&P.Bolin

customer_reviews.title: We love "Crest ProHealth MultiProtection Refreshing Mouthwash Clean Mint" and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: We love "Crest ProHealth MultiProtection Refreshing Mouthwash Clean Mint" and use it all the time.

customer_reviews.text: Quickly delivered with a great price, well packaged, and exceptional quality.

product_meta.title: Crest ProHealth Multi-Protection Refreshing Mouthwash Clean Mint 33.8 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Use Crest Pro-Health Multi-Protection Refreshing Clean Mint Rinse to Kills 99% of germs that can cause plaque, gingivitis and bad breath to help you get better dental check-ups.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :2.99 x 4.65 x 10.35 inches; 2.4 Pounds
 * Date First Available :August 13, 2014
 * Manufacturer :P&G
 * ASIN :B00MY2TQMA

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars872 ratings Use Crest Pro-Health Multi-Protection Refreshing Clean Mint Rinse to Kills 99% of germs that can cause plaque, gingivitis and bad breath to help you get better dental check-ups.
feature_bullets: Kills 99% of germs that can cause plaque, gingivitis and bad breath; In laboratory tests
24 hour protection against plaque and gingivitis by using twice daily
Prevent and reduce gingivitis for healthy gums
Keep teeth cleaner longer vs Brushing alone
